verses.text: I will give you praise, O Lord, \w with|strong="H1732"\w* all \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart; I will make clear all \w the|strong="H1732"\w* wonder \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* works.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* glad \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Most High.

When \w my|strong="H8055"\w* haters \w are|strong="H8034"\w* turned back, \w they|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* broken \w and|strong="H8034"\w* overcome before \w you|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w gave|strong="H7725"\w* approval \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* right \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w cause|strong="H7725"\w*; \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H6440"\w* seated \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* high place judging \w in|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* said sharp words \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* sent \w destruction|strong="H4941"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sinners, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* put \w an|strong="H3588"\w* end \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* name \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4941"\w* ever.

\w You|strong="H0006"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* given \w their|strong="H0006"\w* towns \w to|strong="H8034"\w* \w destruction|strong="H0006"\w*; \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w memory|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w them|strong="H0006"\w* \w has|strong="H1471"\w* gone; \w they|strong="H8034"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* become waste \w for|strong="H0006"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H0006"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H2143"\w* King \w for|strong="H0006"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*: he \w has|strong="H5331"\w* made \w ready|strong="H8552"\w* \w his|strong="H1992"\w* high seat \w for|strong="H0006"\w* judging.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* world \w in|strong="H3427"\w* righteousness, giving \w true|strong="H3068"\w* \w decisions|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples.

\w The|strong="H8199"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3816"\w* \w a|strong="H8199"\w* high tower \w for|strong="H1931"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w are|strong="H8199"\w* crushed \w down|strong="H8199"\w*, \w a|strong="H8199"\w* high tower \w in|strong="H1931"\w* times \w of|strong="H8199"\w* trouble;

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name \w will|strong="H3068"\w* put \w their|strong="H3068"\w* faith \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*; because \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* ever given \w your|strong="H3068"\w* help \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3045"\w* songs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* house \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion: \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* doings clear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w makes|strong="H3427"\w* search \w for|strong="H3068"\w* blood, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5046"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* memory: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* not without thought \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* poor.

\w Have|strong="H3588"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* see \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am troubled \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* haters; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* doors \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w death|strong="H1818"\w*;

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7200"\w* clear all \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H7311"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* glad because \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* salvation.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* nations \w have|strong="H3605"\w* gone down \w into|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hole which \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w*: \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* secret net \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* foot \w taken|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3920"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H7272"\w* given knowledge \w of|strong="H1471"\w* \w himself|strong="H7272"\w* through \w his|strong="H2934"\w* judging: \w the|strong="H3920"\w* evil-doer \w is|strong="H7845"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* \w in|strong="H7272"\w* \w the|strong="H3920"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w which|strong="H2098"\w* \w his|strong="H2934"\w* hands \w had|strong="H1471"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*. (Higgaion. Selah.)

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* sinners \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* nations \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* no memory \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* underworld.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor \w will|strong="H0430"\w* not \w be|strong="H0430"\w* without help; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hopes \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* need \w will|strong="H0430"\w* not \w be|strong="H0430"\w* crushed \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w*.

Up! O Lord; \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0034"\w* overcome \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nations \w be|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

Put \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* fear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* see \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* only \w men|strong="H0582"\w*. (Selah.)
